text: Raúl Baglini (December 23, 1949 – January 3, 2021) was an Argentine politician and lawyer. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1983 to 1993. Baglini was a Senator from 2002 to 2003. He was a member of the Radical Civic Union. He was born in Mendoza, Argentine. Baglini died on January 3, 2021 at a hospital in Mendoza from respiratory failure, aged 71. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Argentine politicians Category:Argentine lawyers Category:People from Mendoza
title: Raúl Baglini
